CustomField.description: This external ID will hold the Customer Number from LX as part of the Integration process. The LX system will populate this field based on the LX creation of a new Company record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This external ID will hold the Customer Number from LX as part of the Integration process. The LX system will populate this field based on the LX creation of a new Company record.
CustomField.label: DI A External ID
